situation: in this covid time , my job in trouble .I tested covid positive and unble to attended my office hour

rewrite_iterations.rewritten_text: It sounds like you're feeling quite the pressure. You might consider reaching out to your friends for networking while also pursuing the experience letter. To manage, you could: 1) List down which friends might be able to help with job leads, 2) Set a specific time to contact them, and 3) Decide on a timeline for following up with your old company for the experience letter.
rewrite_iterations.reasoning: The original response lacked practical help despite the seeker explicitly asking for guidance on prioritizing tasks. I maintained a brief empathy statement and provided a short 2-3 step guide to help the seeker make a decision.

final_result.label: normal
final_result.response: It sounds like you're feeling quite the pressure. You might consider reaching out to your friends for networking while also pursuing the experience letter. To manage, you could: 1) List down which friends might be able to help with job leads, 2) Set a specific time to contact them, and 3) Decide on a timeline for following up with your old company for the experience letter.
